
hash_get(+Table, +Key, -Value)

   Find the entry stored under key Key and return its value

Arguments
   Table               A hash table
   Key                 a ground term
   Value               Any term

Type
   library(hash)

Fail Conditions
   No entry for Key

See Also
   hash_create / 1, hash_set / 3, hash_list / 3, hash_contains / 2
